meta.title: PROTOFOLIO_ by siddharthmhjn.com
meta.description: Professional portfolio showcasing skills, projects, and experience.

personal.name: Tony Stark
personal.title: Genius, Billionaire, Philanthropist
personal.subtitle: Iron Man | Avenger | Inventor
personal.footerDescription: CEO of Stark Industries & Iron Man. Building technology to protect the world.

paragraphs: I'm Tony Stark - genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist. After being held captive in Afghanistan, I built the first Iron Man suit in a cave with a box of scraps. That experience changed everything - I went from weapons manufacturer to Earth's greatest defender. I've pioneered arc reactor technology, created advanced AI systems like J.A.R.V.I.S. and F.R.I.D.A.Y., and led the Avengers against threats ranging from rogue robots to intergalactic warlords.

Beyond building suits, I focus on clean energy innovation, nanotechnology advancement, and protecting the world from threats both terrestrial and cosmic. By combining my engineering genius, unlimited resources, and an unwavering commitment to humanity's future, I deliver solutions that others consider impossible. I am Iron Man.

experience.title: CEO & Lead Inventor
experience.description: Transformed Stark Industries from a weapons manufacturer to a leader in clean energy and advanced technology. Invented the arc reactor, created the Iron Man suit series, and pioneered numerous technologies that have shaped the modern world.

experience.title: Founding Member
experience.description: Co-founded Earth's Mightiest Heroes alongside Captain America, Thor, Hulk, Black Widow, and Hawkeye. Led the team through multiple world-ending threats including the Battle of New York, Ultron, and Thanos.

experience.title: Quantum Engineer
experience.description: Cracked the code for time travel using quantum realm navigation. Designed the Time-Space GPS that enabled the Avengers to retrieve the Infinity Stones from the past and reverse the Snap, saving half of all life in the universe.

projects.title: Iron Man Armor Series
projects.description: 85+ iterations of powered exoskeleton suits featuring flight, weapons systems, AI integration, and nanotechnology.

projects.title: J.A.R.V.I.S. AI System
projects.description: Advanced natural language AI assistant capable of managing complex systems, security protocols, and suit operations.

projects.title: Stark Tower / Avengers Tower
projects.description: Self-sustaining skyscraper powered entirely by arc reactor technology. Serves as Avengers headquarters.

awards.title: Saved the Universe
awards.description: Used the Infinity Gauntlet to reverse the Snap and defeat Thanos, sacrificing everything to save half of all life in the universe.

awards.title: Person of the Year
awards.description: Recognized for leading the defense of New York City against the Chitauri invasion and carrying a nuclear missile through a wormhole.

awards.title: Apogee Award
awards.description: Honored for advancing technology and clean energy innovation through Stark Industries' groundbreaking arc reactor technology.

testimonials.name: Steve Rogers
testimonials.quote: Tony may be the most annoying person I've ever met, but he's also one of the bravest. When it mattered most, he made the sacrifice play - the one I always said he'd never make. He was wrong about a lot of things, but he was right about the important ones.

testimonials.name: Pepper Potts
testimonials.quote: I've watched Tony grow from a man who had everything and cared about nothing, to someone who was willing to give everything for the people he loved. Behind the armor was the most selfless person I've ever known.

testimonials.name: Peter Parker
testimonials.quote: Mr. Stark believed in me when no one else did. He gave me a chance, mentored me, and showed me what it really means to be a hero. Everything I am as Spider-Man, I owe to him.
